var fieldIds = fields.reduce(function(acc, f){ acc.push(f.name); return acc }, []) db.records = result.data.reduce(function(acc, v){ var row = {} if (v.data) { Object.assign(row, v.data); // in case of form data, rows under 'data' subkey if (v._id) { Object.assign(row, _.pick( v, ['_id', 'modified','created'])); } } else { row = Object.assign(v, _.pick(fields)); } Object.assign(row, _.pick(v, fieldIds)); // debugger if (row._id) { row.id = row._id } // normalize acc.push(row); return acc; }, []); // debugger
